item.title: Introduction to Git and seven rules of great Git Commit Message
item.description: As part of summer training at #dgplug, Sayan took our basics to Git session. We were introduced to basics of VCS(Version Control System), need to use a VCS and introduction to Git. These were some of commands we learn during the session conducted over the course of two days, git init is used initialize Git repository 1 $ git init git config to used to configure various Git configuration using below command one can configure their Name and Email globally for Git.
